snippet: Hewlett-Packard is joining what is becoming a corporate stampede toward spinoffs, but the true test is in how the spun-off companies perform.
abstract: James B Stewart Common Sense column analyzes Hewlett-Packard's decision to split company up into HP Inc and Hewlett-Packard Enterprise, which was announced by chief executive Meg Whitman; notes company joins ranks of corporations that have spun off parts of their companies, increasingly popular strategy to improve performance.
lead_paragraph: Hewlett-Packard is joining what is becoming a corporate stampede toward spinoffs, but the true test is in how the spun-off companies perform.

headline.print_headline: Doubts Linger as HP Poises for a Split
headline.main: Doubts Linger as HP Poises for a Split
